channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description: [b][/b][i][/i]I dont know if this is the right section, But evertime one of my friends try to join my server, It says error connecting to server. I have a modem and no-ip I have port 43594 opened and allowed through my firewall. I have tryed uTorrent To port foward it, But it did not work. I have been using hamachi to let a few people on my server, Someone please help me!! Thanks :( :confused: :| if u know, please add me on msn. Ashley_rox435@hotmail.com I am on msn most of the time. But I also have team viewer3 Incase I dont know how to do it. Thanks.. -dog469 [btw i dont know why i made my name this :p]
